props.customKeySort: Function used on specific keys within the item object. `customSort` is skipped for columns with `customKeySort` specified.
props.multiSort: Let user sort by multiple properties/columns.
props.multiSortKey: When enabled, user is required to hold a keyboard key (Ctrl on PC and Command on Mac) to sort by multiple columns.
props.multiSortMode: When user selects a new column to sort by, it will be set first (`prepend`) or last (`append`) in the sort priority.
props.multiSortModeModifier: Allows user to use both multi-sort modes (`append` and `prepend`) simultaneously.
props.sortBy: Array of column keys and sort orders that determines the sort order of the table.
